note:
Autistic Binary Transwoman in IT (because of course).

🏳️‍⚧️🇺🇦🇵🇸🇪🇺🇹🇼

Finally on #OfficialHRT, after a long time of proudly using #OpenHRT, because the #DutchHellcare system sucks

Boosts are pretty much always welcome.

Beware of hot takes.

Please don’t read too much into my follows, non-follows and unfollows.

I sometimes post images from my phone, but prefer to post alt-texts on a keyboard. If one is missing on a picture, give it a few minutes, it will be there soon.

In an open relationship with @Senna. 😊

Still denying any notion that I’m a cat girl, ignore the purring when I get to cuddle with someone!

Unsolicited advice given in good faith is unironically welcome, I’d rather have correct information and receiving it doesn’t hurt my ego. That doesn’t necessarily mean that I’ll follow it, but that I’ll take it into account.
